title: feat(document-reader): add Notion document reader support #274
body:
# Add Notion Document Reader Support
添加 Notion 文档读取器支持

## Features 功能特性

- Add NotionResource to handle Notion API interactions
  添加 NotionResource 类处理 Notion API 交互
- Add NotionDocumentReader implementing DocumentReader interface
  添加 NotionDocumentReader 实现 DocumentReader 接口
- Support both Notion pages and databases content types
  支持 Notion 页面和数据库两种内容类型
- Add comprehensive metadata extraction
  添加完整的元数据提取功能
- Add integration tests with environment variables
  添加基于环境变量的集成测试

## Implementation Details 实现细节

1. **NotionResource**
   - Handle authentication with Notion API
     处理 Notion API 认证
   - Support page and database content fetching
     支持页面和数据库内容获取
   - Extract metadata from API response
     从 API 响应中提取元数据

2. **NotionDocumentReader**
   - Implement Spring AI's DocumentReader interface
     实现 Spring AI 的 DocumentReader 接口
   - Convert Notion content to Document format
     将 Notion 内容转换为 Document 格式
   - Handle metadata safely with null checks
     安全处理元数据，包含空值检查

3. **Integration Tests**
   - Test both page and database reading
     测试页面和数据库的读取功能
   - Verify metadata extraction
     验证元数据提取
   - Use environment variables for credentials
     使用环境变量存储凭证

## Usage 使用方法
author: brianxiadong

comments.body: ptal @sincerity-being

title: Calling Function always throws Exception:No function callback found for function name
body:
Spring-ai-alibaba
Calling Function always throws Exception:No function callback found for function name, because the function name's value is always "" which I found by debug the code of DashScopeChatModel.

I need the progress do not throw the exception instead of telling user other info or abandon calling function.
I also want to known how can I prevent from this exception?
author: Mrs-Snow

comments.body: I encountered the same exception while using the stream() function; however, the problem does not occur when I use call().

> I encountered the same exception while using the stream() function; however, the problem does not occur when I use call().

Modify the class DashScopeAiStreamFunctionCallingHelper(line142) to 'String name = (current.name() != null && current.name().length() > 0 ? current.name() : previous.name());' The problem was fixed!

> I encountered the same exception while using the stream() function; however, the problem does not occur when I use call().

using call will avoid method merge，so it does not occur。

body:
我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。另外请按照如下要求提交相关信息节省社区维护同学的理解成本，否则该讨论极有可能直接被忽视或关闭。
We recommend using English. If you are non-native English speaker, you can use the translation software. In addition, please submit relevant information according to the following requirements to save the understanding cost of community maintenances, otherwise the discussion is very likely to be ignored or closed directly.


**Which Component**

Spring AI Alibaba Plugin

**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

when we use Spring AI Alibaba plugin(such as larkSuite doc plugin and so on),the user may use the chatClient Builder method to build an LLM request. However, when we use it, we need to input function name. Due to the hard coding for function name, the answer perhaps returns **No function callback found for function name**.
So, How should we solve it?
author: PolarishT

comments.body:
solution: use APT(Annotaion Processing Tool) to build a static mapping (such as  chatClient.buillder().withfunctions(FunctionCalling.LarkSuite.createDoc).build()🟰 chatClient.buillder().withfunctions("LarkSuiteCreateDocFunction").build())

users only use mvn package can build this APT Class.

```java
processor.FunctionCalling.enable=true
processor.allFunctionCallingInstance.package=com.alibaba.cloud.ai.plugin
processor.allFunctionCallingInstance.className=your-class-name
```
cc @chickenlj I want to make an attempt to solve this issue.
seem good solution  to me
Could you list a detail fix process @PolarishT
emm, this way to solve maybe not good way, I will give a new way to solve it. And I will paste the report to #198.

title: Refactor the deign smells for better code quality
body:
Describe what this PR does / why we need it:

This pull request addresses identified design smells in the codebase and implements refactoring techniques to enhance the maintainability, modularity, and reusability of the code. Specifically, the changes improve code structure by extracting and encapsulating logic, thereby reducing duplication and improving overall code quality.

Does this pull request fix one issue?
NONE

Describe how you did it:

Pull-Up Method: Moved shared functionalities from dependent classes to a higher-level class. This ensures the functionality is reusable and avoids redundant code duplication. Other classes now simply call the centralized methods.

Extract Method: Isolated specific retry logic from the original class and shifted it into a dedicated class. This approach simplifies the original class by abstracting reusable functionalities into separate methods, making the code more modular and easier to maintain.

Describe how to verify it:

1. Compiled it to check there is no formatting issues, and to check the build status.
2. Verified the changes by running all existing test cases to ensure no functionality is broken.

Special notes for reviews

This code refactor aims to enhance readability, maintainability, and modularity without altering the core logic. Feedback on the clarity of these changes and their alignment with best practices is highly appreciated.

Additionally, these modifications align with project standards and may serve as a basis for further improvements. Any suggestions for optimizing the variable naming, refactored functions, or memory handling logic would be particularly valuable.
author: archiesingla

comments.body:
> This code refactor aims to enhance readability, maintainability, and modularity without altering the core logic.

There are issues with the serialization of  messages in Spring
author: robocanic

comments.body:
1、新的graph这一层，是不是加个页面映射的接口？独立或者继承NodeAction都行，用来映射前端元素。
2、LLM的Node，除了input，其他属性（systemMessage、toolCall）来源应该来自页面设置，get/set可能更合适。
3、输入缺少toolCall集合、输出缺少llm建议的toolcall。

> 1、新的graph这一层，是不是加个页面映射的接口？独立或者继承NodeAction都行，用来映射前端元素。 2、LLM的Node，除了input，其他属性（systemMessage、toolCall）来源应该来自页面设置，get/set可能更合适。 3、输入缺少toolCall集合、输出缺少llm建议的toolcall。

1. 新的这一层我设想上还是给仅编码用户使用的，如果掺入前端元素会让编码的用户捋不清关系。个人更偏向于在这个基础上再包装一层，和前端对应上
2. got it
3. 输入有functionNames，只是测试中没有加进去，输出中的toolcall会被Spring中的ChatModel自动执行，然后继续对话

author: robinyeeh

title: [RAG] Introduce reranking to the RAG retrieval process
body:
* Introduce reranking step to retrieval process
* Add RAG example with reranking enabled

Frequently, not all results retrieved by RetrievalAdvisor are truly relevant to the user query. This is because, during the initial retrieval stage, it is often preferable to use faster and more cost-effective models, particularly when dealing with a large volume of data. The trade-off is that the retrieval quality may be lower.

Providing irrelevant information to the LLM can be costly and, in the worst case, lead to hallucinations. Therefore, in the second stage, we can perform re-ranking of the results obtained in the first stage and eliminate irrelevant results using a more advanced model (e.g., Cohere Rerank).
author: chickenlj

comments.body: done and close this issue.

title: mvn install error RELEASE does not allow version
body:
**Which Component**
./mvnw clean install -Pproduction  have a error

**Describe the bug**
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal on project playground-flight-booking: Could not collect dependencies for project com.alibaba.cloud.ai:playground-flight-booking:jar:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
[ERROR] Failed to read artifact descriptor for com.alibaba.cloud.ai:spring-ai-alibaba-starter:jar:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
[ERROR]         Caused by: The following artifacts could not be resolved: com.alibaba.cloud.ai:spring-ai-alibaba-starter:pom:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT (absent): Could not transfer artifact com.alibaba.cloud.ai:spring-ai-alibaba-starter:pom:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT from/to maven-central : status code: 400, reason phrase: Repository version policy: RELEASE does not allow version: 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT (400)
